description:
Let's define the cost of a string $ s $ as the number of index pairs $ i $ and $ j $ ( $ 1 \le i < j < |s| $ ) such that $ s_i = s_j $ and $ s_{i+1} = s_{j+1} $ .

You are given two positive integers $ n $ and $ k $ . Among all strings with length $ n $ that contain only the first $ k $ characters of the Latin alphabet, find a string with minimum possible cost. If there are multiple such strings with minimum cost — find any of them.
inputFormat: The only line contains two integers $ n $ and $ k $ ( $ 1 \le n \le 2 \cdot 10^5; 1 \le k \le 26 $ ).
outputFormat: Print the string $ s $ such that it consists of $ n $ characters, each its character is one of the $ k $ first Latin letters, and it has the minimum possible cost among all these strings. If there are multiple such strings — print any of them.
translation:
定义一个字符串 $s$ 的花费(cost)为满足
```cpp
s[i]==s[j] && s[i+1]==s[j+1]
```
的数对 $(i,j)$ 的数量 ($0 \leq i < j < |s|-1$)

现在需要使用从小写字母 $a$ 开始的 $k$ 种字符，构造一个长度为 $n$ 的字符串，且要求花费最小。

本题spj,如果有多种情况输出任意一种即可，数据范围见原题。
